summary: Successfully tested P0 bootstrap admin fix and password management features. All critical functionality working correctly - bootstrap admin creation, login, password changes, and user management UI fully functional.
passed_tests: Bootstrap admin login successful with admin@espaciodatos.com / admin123
Backend logs show 'Bootstrap admin created' or 'Admin already exists' on startup
Admin can change other users' passwords via API
Admin can change own password via API
Password change error handling works (wrong password, too short password rejected)
User creation API works with admin/asesor/cliente roles
Bootstrap admin login through UI successful
Admin dashboard loads and displays user statistics correctly
User Management page accessible and functional
Password change dialog opens and submits successfully
User creation dialog opens and submits successfully
Role selection dropdown works in user creation form
All UI interactions smooth and responsive
Navigation between admin dashboard and user management works
Bootstrap admin has full admin privileges and access

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All bootstrap and password management APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All admin UI functionality working correctly
